comment.author: 46468267@N07
comment._content:
I was amazed to see this image. Roy Kitchen (on the right - banjo) is my father. Indeed he married and moved Tweed - he worked for Trudeau Motors. He died in 1955 leaving my Brother, my Mother and myself. John and I are now retired and back in Tweed. I never heard much of his music (I was too young) although I still have that banjo he is holding.
Thanks for the memory
Jim

comment.author: 23121382@N07
comment._content:
Jim - I'm so pleased that you found the photo. Thanks for the extra information about your father and for taking the time to comment!

Amanda
